and a.name like "%"#{name}"%"

select a.id id,a.`name` `name`,a.fid fid,a.image image,b.`name` fname,a.url url,a.`order` `order`,a.`status` `status`,a.permission permission,a.`type` `type` from sys_menu a left join sys_menu b on a.fid=b.id order by a.`order` asc

select a.id id,a.`name` `name`,a.image image,a.fid fid,b.`name` fname,a.url url,a.`order` `order`,a.`status` `status`,a.permission permission,a.`type` `type` from sys_menu a left join sys_menu b on a.fid=b.id where a.id=#{id}

mapper.delete: delete sm,sum,srm from sys_menu sm left join sys_user_menu sum on sm.id=sum.menu_id left join sys_role_menu srm on sm.id=srm.menu_id where sm.id in (${_parameter})
